name: Recommender System
body:
Using Collaborative Filtering I've taken the MovieLens (1 Million) sized dataset and made a recommender system to recommend movies to each user. 


For 5 users, a quarter of their watched history was removed from the data set. The algorithm was then run to see if it could predict some of the movies the users had seen.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
